result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Prior: 520 E Reed Ave 14, Manitowoc, WI 54220

**NOT ON THE RECORD**
Defendant did not appear, she is at Mendota. (After hearing DA received an email from Mendota that defendant was refusing to attend hearing)
This matter is rescheduled to 10/20/2022, at 11:15 a.m., via zoom.

3:34 pm - Defendant Larkricia E. McDaniel not in court.  She refused to appear from the county jail.  Prosecuting attorney Jordan W. Feest appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Court finds good cause to toll time limits and will reset this matter.  Hopefully the defendant will decide to appear at the next hearing.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 11:00 am.

1:45 PM Defendant Larkricia E. McDaniel not in court.  Attorney Jordan W. Feest appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant refuses to appear.  Court tolls time limits.
Preliminary hearing reset to 09-07-2022 at 3:00pm.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

2:03 PM - Defendant Larkricia E. McDaniel, in custody at Manitowoc County Jail. Defendant refused to come to court today.  Prosecuting attorney Angelina R Scarpelli in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court sets preliminary hearing.  Court sets bail at $200.00 cash with the condition that defendant has no contact with T.S and N.T.  Bail not furnished.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued. Copy filed.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
